articles.title: Ubisoft CEO Blames Outlaws ' Struggles On 'Choppy' Star Wars Universe - Kotaku
articles.description: And not, for instance, hugely overspending on a reasonably good game

articles.title: Microsoft wants to fix “slow or sluggish” performance in Windows 11 - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft wants feedback on Windows 11 slow performance. It’s now automatically logging slow or sluggish performance in test builds of Windows 11.

articles.title: “This Shouldn’t Exist in Orbit”: Astronaut Stunned by ‘Impossible’ Satellite That Could Upend the Future of Space Exploration Forever - Rude Baguette
articles.description: IN A NUTSHELL 🚀 Proteus Space achieved the fastest satellite construction, launching just 13 months after project approval. 🤖 The startup relies on AI-driven software to quickly generate 2,300 satellite configurations, reducing time and cost. 🔬 Stephen Rob…

articles.title: WhatsApp is dropping its native Windows app in favor of an uglier web version - The Verge
articles.description: Meta is updating its WhatsApp for Windows app. It’s changing into a basic web app, instead of a native Windows version.

articles.title: It's the end of the internet as we know it - Quartz
articles.description: The AI era means the internet is splitting in two: one for people, another for the bots

articles.title: 3D character modeller’s LinkedIn mentions work on Nintendo SRPG sequel exclusive to Switch 2 - My Nintendo News
articles.description: It has been discovered via a 3D character modeller’s LinkedIn account that they are working on a Nintendo strategy RPG sequel which is exclusive to the recently launched Nintendo Switch 2.
